leadStatements: Full-stack Software Engineer with a passion for learning
10 years’ experience developing enterprise web applications with Microsoft technology stack
Seeking opportunity to solve complex problems in interesting domains using computer science techniques

responsibilities.description: Full stack design, development, deployment and maintenance of enterprise web applications, web services (APIs) and databases relied on by a firm with over 1,300 architects
DevOps management using Microsoft Azure including Builds, Release Pipelines, and the requisition of services
Managing and mentoring and junior software developers

responsibilities.description: Full stack design, development, deployment and maintenance of enterprise web applications, web services (APIs) and databases relied on by thousands of users in a [$3B+ company](https://www.google.com/search?tbm=fin&q=CLH)
Daily in-person (verbal) and written communication with executive management, domain experts and other stakeholders to translate business needs into actionable requirements
Researching, evaluating, designing and implementing systems and ad hoc solutions for various departments
Balancing and prioritizing the needs of multiple simultaneous projects and stakeholders

testimonials.body: Matt has worked with our organization on several projects and has always provided clear and precise communication. His depth of knowledge on various subjects and his ability to research new solutions has been a great asset. Matt has a diverse skill set which can always be relied upon to provide multiple solutions to the range of technical and analytical problems we’ve faced. He has been a highly valued asset and we would gladly work with him again.
testimonials.author: George Curtis

testimonials.body: Matt is always timely and accurate with his projects and always puts in extra effort to ensure customer needs are met. His depth of knowledge on various subjects and his ability to research new software or techniques has been very beneficial to our small team. Matt has a very diverse tool set and can always be relied on to provide multiple solutions to problems that we face. I wish I had a team of people like Matt working in my group.
testimonials.author: Jeremy Rabbe

personalProjects.title: Crypto Currency Trading Bot
personalProjects.subTitle: (March 2018)
personalProjects.description: System for Automated Trading on Crypto Currency Exchange

accomplishments.description: A personal exploration of crypto currencies, automated real-time market trading, machine learning, data analysis and the various technology options available for these purposes
Project included the creation of many evolving prototypes, including

children.description: Services for collecting market data in real-time and computing market signals, indicators and predictive features using online algorithms
Web applications for telemetry visualization and manual bot control
Machine learning systems for predicting profitable trade prices
Autonomous trading bots operating in a live market
WebSocket client and server apps for receiving and broadcasting live market data
Implementing and testing various programmatic trading strategies
Various methods of IPC (e.g.: REST, WebSocket, Redis Blocking Queue)
